data.title: Adult Softball Leagues
data.meta_description: Find registration information and a schedule of game days for Webster's adult softball leagues.
data.text:
Summer Softball Leagues

Registration for the Summer 2024 Softball will begin on March 1, 2024

To view current schedules for the 2024 Summer League CLICK HERE Version OptionsAdult Softball LeaguesHeadline

Version OptionsAdult Softball LeaguesHeadline

rsion OptionsAdult Softball LeaguesHeadline Version OptionsAdult Softball LeaguesHeadline

To reports scores for the Summer 2024 league CLICK HERE Version OptionsAdult Softball LeaguesHeadline rsion OptionsAdult Softball LeaguesHeadline Version OptionsAdult Softball LeaguesHeadline

All leagues will play a 10 game schedule followed by single elimination playoff games for all divisions/teams. Space in a particular division is not guaranteed until a $25 non-refundable deposit has been received. Placement of returning teams will be determined from standings from the previous season. No individual registrations. Full league fees due by 1st game.w.allprosoftware.net/webstersoftball2021/

Fall Softball Leagues:

Fall Ball registration will begin August 1st

All leagues will play a five-game schedule followed by playoff. Space in a particular division is not guaranteed until $25.00 nonrefundable league deposit has been submitted. Placement of returning teams will be determined by standings from the previous season. League fee is $385.00-$400 per team (subject to change). Games are played at Webster Recreation Center. Leagues will begin in early September.

Men's Leagues available:

Tuesday and Wednesday evenings (upper and lower divisions available)

Coed Leagues available:

Thursday's evening (1 division)
